full_summary:
### Tender: Comprehensive Health Services - RCMP

#### Solicitation Number: M1000-3-5420
#### Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-15 13:00:00
#### Solicitation Status: Expression of Interest

#### Brief Description:
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a registered psychologist to provide comprehensive health services on an as-and-when required basis. The contract period will be for one year with an irrevocable option to extend for two additional one-year periods.

#### Essential Requirements:

*   The contract will be based at the RCMP Occupational Health Unit in St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador.
*   Service providers must maintain RCMP Top Secret security clearance.
*   Service providers will be required to score between 0 and 28 points for technical evaluation criteria.

#### Evaluation Criteria:

*   Bidders will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
*   Suppliers must meet all mandatory criteria and comply with all requirements of the bid solicitation.

#### Eligibility Requirements:

*   To be eligible, bidders must be registered with the RCMP in accordance with the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses.

#### Contact Information:
*   Sandra Bremner
*   Email: <sandra.bremner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca>
*   Phone: (902) 717-5395

#### Attachments:
*   [M1000-3-5420-AMD-003-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7742/m1000-3-5420-amd-003_en.pdf)
*   [M1000-3-5420-MOD-003-fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7742/m1000-3-5420-mod-003_fr.pdf)

#### Security and Integrity Clearances:
Bidders must maintain RCMP Top Secret security clearance. The security requirement is based on the RCMP's requirements for protecting sensitive information.

#### Disclaimer:
The RCMP retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. The RCMP assumes no liability for any errors or omissions in the tender documents.
